intro:
Spin and take a peek into the world of dogs!  
A cute puzzle game where you create adorable puppy art that will make you smile.
description:
This is a puzzle game where you spin panels to align dogs facing in the correct direction.  

The controls are simple: carefully look at the puzzle image and tap the panel you want to rotate!  
Depending on your clear time, you can earn 1 to 3 cute puppies.  

If you get stuck, you can use the hint button up to three times.  
It will automatically fix one row of panels to the correct orientation, so you can play without worry.  

Simple yet surprisingly deep, it’s perfect for short breaks.  
Aim for a 3-star clear on every stage and complete your Dog Encyclopedia!
